description: Pigsqueak (Bergenia crassifolia) is an amazing plant species that offers beauty and long-lasting color throughout the year. This tough evergreen thrives in difficult growing conditions, making it a good choice for difficult to landscape areas. It boasts glossy green, textured foliage that remains year-round and blooms from early spring to summer with stunning hot pink flowers. Its ability to tolerate both humidity and mild droughts make it a perfect addition for any garden. Pigsqueak is also deer and rabbit resistant, a welcome trait for gardeners everywhere.
